alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Custer; Eastern Cherry; Garfield; Hooker; Logan; Loup; Thomas; Western Cherry; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:18PM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisories, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Friday. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Friday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Friday to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts today may lead to areas of blowing snow from existing snow pack in addition to new snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Custer; Eastern Cherry; Garfield; Hooker; Logan; Loup; Thomas; Western Cherry; Wheeler
